name: Curse of the Drunkard
description:
Move with WASD

Attack with Left Click and Right Click

Dodge with Spacebar

Run with Left Shift

Good luck!

Warning: This version of the game is missing the last room of the dungeon. I uploaded a fixed version here: https://wolfoso.itch.io/curse-of-the-drunkard-no-jam 

Feel free to play and vote the bugged one and re-play the fixed one afterwards, uploaded for the sake of game development.
